snippet.title: If I Had - Retinitis Pigmentosa
snippet.description: ... age 3 or 4 a parent is saying “Johnny, get up out of that bed, and get into the bathroom and brush your teeth” and Johnny stumbles and goes into the door. Retinitis pigmentosa ...
